title: [MINDSET] Ep. 271 How To Have More Fulfillment (through parenting + fostering children!) with Ebony Rafaeli
description:
Ebony Rafaeli is a social worker with over 15 years of experience in child services. Ebony is here to discuss how to reach deeper fulfillment through the experience of foster parenting. 

Ash discusses leadership, fulfillment, and making changes in your life…if these spaces feel aligned with your values, this episode will truly light you up. While it isn’t the traditional mindset conversation, Ash and Ebony discuss leadership in action, mindset shifts under pressure, and how to look in unique places for your purpose. 

This is a truly impactful episode packed with actionable value and sprinkles of inspiration. Don’t miss this!

In This Episode, You’ll Learn:

  1. What to consider when looking into fostering.
  2. Insight into sex trafficking: how this looks in action and how it impacts young women.
  3. The mindset to take when exploring a new venture in life.
  4. How to give back to your community and the younger generations.

 

Connect with Ash:

https://www.instagram.com/ashleystahl/

Take a FREE Quiz to Discover Your Most Authentic Career Path:

https://www.ashleystahl.com/freequiz/
